Gene-Pseudotime Correlation

Source: R/pseudotime.R
gene_pt_correlation.Rd

Gene-Pseudotime Correlation

Usage

gene_pt_correlation(
  seurat_obj,
  pseudotime_col,
  assay = "RNA",
  layer = "data",
  method = "spearman"
)

Arguments

seurat_obj

Seurat object

pseudotime_col

Metadata column name for pseudotime

assay

Assay name

layer

Layer name

method

Correlation method

Value

Data frame with gene correlations
